title: Ship containers
description: Don't lose Ship containers. HTML5 game with interesting physics. Collect as much as possible containers. Simple puzzle logic tap and save container, and repeat again, try to get best score
instructions: Tap and Drop containers to the Ship.

title: Frog Jump
description: Welcome to "Frog Jump," a thrilling game where you must survive on a continuously moving wheel. Dodge the monsters by jumping. Beware! If a monster touches you, it's game over. Test your skills, stay alive, and aim for an epic score.
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Fill Up Block Logic Puzzle
description: Fill Up Block Logic Puzzle is an excellent game to challenge your brain when you have the spare time. You need to put the square with the direction is placed in the corresponding position so that it fills each empty space. The further you go, the harder it gets. Are you ready to challenge?
instructions: Hold to move

title: Emergency HQ City Rescuer
description: Emergency HQ: City Rescuer is a very special rescue game. What you have to do is to ensure that people can land safely. But be careful of obstacles on the ground, which is also a test of your reaction. Start the challenge!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Delete Puzzle Erase One Part
description: Delete Puzzle: Erase One Part definitely is a game that everyone will enjoy. It will test your intelligence and logic skills. Each level features a different scene. You need to restore the scene by erasing the extra parts according to the problem. Have the confidence to succeed in the challenge?
instructions: Swipe to delete

title: Pixel Block 3D
description: Pixel Block 3D is a relaxing online game, and it is suitable for people of all ages. In this game, you only need to control the direction of the block with the mouse to touch all the pixels. Pay attention to the gaps in the pattern, or your block will fall down and end the game. There are many different levels to be challenged. Come on and enjoy the game!
instructions: Pixel Block 3D is a relaxing online game, and it is suitable for people of all ages. In this game, you only need to control the direction of the block with the mouse to touch all the pixels. Pay attention to the gaps in the pattern, or your block will fall down and end the game. There are many different levels to be challenged. Come on and enjoy the game!

title: 1010 Treasure Rush
description: 1010 Treasure Rush is a Tetris block puzzle game. Your goal is to collect all treasure blocks. Pick and drop the block sets on the board to complete a row. All the treasure blocks in that row will be collected.
instructions: Use a mouse or touch-pad to play this game.

title: Physics Puzzle
description: “Physics puzzle” is a puzzle-style game mixed with physics, where the player has the objective of hitting the ball inside the basket using the available objects to make the path that the ball must follow to pass through the obstacles.
instructions: On mobile, use screen touch On the computer, use the mouse.

title: LGBT Jigsaw Puzzle - Find LGBT Flags
description: The best LGBT puzzle game Drag and drop the puzzle parts * Easy to learn * Addictive levels Features: -Free beautiful HD LGBT puzzles variety of collection flags of: Gilbert Pride Flag , Bisexual Flag, Bigender Pride Flag, Genderflux Pride Flag, Transgender Flag, Progress Pride Flag, Intersex Flag, and more! - Play, earn coins, and unlock new puzzles. - Save your puzzles to show your friends. lesbian flag ? gay flag ? gay + lesbian = ???
instructions: Drag and drop the puzzle parts

title: Car Out
description: Get ready for the ultimate parking challenge in "Car Out"! This captivating parking game will put your skills to the test as you become a master at escaping traffic jams. Navigate through a series of challenging puzzles and use your exceptional parking techniques to free your car from the jammed parking lot. With each level presenting unique obstacles, it's up to you to solve the puzzles and save the day.
instructions: Click the car to move it.

title: Block Puzzle
description: Like Tetris (a classic block game in the olden days), Block Puzzle is an addictive puzzle game with splendidly designed gameplay elements that you can now play on your smartphones. Unlike other puzzle game apps, Block Puzzle comes with an element of twist, making it a lot more fun.
instructions: -Drag and drop blocks into 10×10 grid -Fill the blocks with a row or column to eliminate them -Game will be over if there is no room on the board for given blocks -Blocks CAN'T be rotated

title: Grass Reaper
description: Grass Reaper is a casual mini game that only requires you to control the reaper and harvest a set amount of grass for each level. The initial state of your reaper is not enough to collect all the grass at once, so you need to collect and sell it, and then use the gold to upgrade the reaper to achieve the effect of passing the level faster!
instructions: Slide to move

title: Matchstick Puzzles
description: Solving puzzles and tasks with matches is an exciting, and most importantly, useful activity! Such puzzles perfectly train memory, resourcefulness, develop logical thinking, spatial imagination. They will please both children and adults.
instructions: The rules of the puzzles are very simple: you need to remove, add or shift a certain number of matches so as to get the correct arithmetic equality, change the outlines or the number of geometric shapes.

title: Word Search - Fun Puzzle Games
description: Play a new word puzzle game about animals and challenge your brain! Find the name of the animal from the picture and swipe the letters! Boost your brain: Grow from Junior to Supermind by unlocking in-game achievements Get as smart as Einstein! Raise your IQ and gather the collection of the greatest minds of mankind.
instructions: At each level, there are 2 pictures of animals and a field of letters. You need to find 2 animal names on the field to increase your IQ score. To highlight the desired name, press and drag from the first letter to the last. The highlighted letters will change color. The word is automatically formed when the last letter is highlighted. If you come across a difficult animal, you can use hints for coins. You can earn additional coins by testing your luck.

title: Thief Puzzle Online
description: Are you ready to embark on a thrilling adventure with a stickman thief? Look no further than Thief Puzzle Online, an exciting online game that combines puzzles and action-packed gameplay. In this game, your mission is to help the stickman thief retrieve precious objects while navigating through challenging levels. Best of all, you can enjoy this game for free on Kiz10.com!
instructions: PC controls: Use the mouse to move the hand Touch controls: Touch the screen to drag your hand

title: Word Search Summer
description: Find the word in a straight line of blocks (Horizontally, vertically, or diagonally with any direction), press the block showing the first alphabet, and move till you come to the last alphabet of the word. Find all the words displayed in the left panel to complete a level. Complete all levels to win this game.
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Park Me
description: Park Me is a game of moving cars out of the parking lot. In the game, there will be many cars parked in the parking lot. First of all, the outermost cars must be moved out, and the corresponding exits and barriers of each car must be observed. The car in front finally saved the car.
instructions: Every level is different, with real surprises and fun challenges.The situation around the entire parking lot requires you to check and not to encounter other vehicles.

title: Math Rockets Addition
description: This is a math puzzle game where the player needs to tap the rocket, showing the correct answer to the given addition expression. In each level, you will have 10 expressions to solve. Complete all 8 challenges and enhance your math skills.
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Puzzle & island
description: Collect diamonds and grow your island! Place blocks on squares to form vertical or horizontal rows. Game ends when no more blocks can be placed.
instructions: Tap to rotate blocks. Drag to move blocks.

title: Block Puzzle Sudoku
description: Easy to play but challenging puzzle game! Easy to play, but difficult to be a master. The more blocks crush, the more score you will get. Try it and you will love this block puzzle game. Features of the Block Puzzle Sudoku: Hours of fun, exciting play. Innovation of classic brick game. No time limits. You can play anytime and anywhere! We really hope you enjoy it!
instructions: Place the pieces into the board. Once you fill in a vertical or horizontal line, it will disappear, freeing up space for new pieces. The game will be over if there is no space for any of the given blocks below the board.

title: Sudoku 4 in 1
description: Sudoku is a popular logic-based puzzle game that can be played online. The game Sudoku 4 in 1 consists of a 9x9 grid, divided into nine 3x3 sub-grids. The objective of the game is to fill each of the 81 cells in the grid with a number from 1 to 9, with each number appearing only once in each row, column, and sub-grid.
instructions: Click and hold on the empty cell where you want to place the number. Drag the number to the empty cell and release the mouse button. Remember that each number can only appear once in each row, column, and sub-grid. So, as you fill in numbers, be sure to double-check that they are in the correct places.

title: Free Birds
description: Prepare for an exhilarating challenge in "Free the Bird"! Take aim and shoot the ropes that hold the birdcage to set these beautiful creatures free. Show off your precise shooting skills as you carefully break down the barriers and release the birds into the open sky. With each level posing new obstacles and puzzles, can you rescue all the birds and become their hero?
instructions: Click, hold, rotate to aim and shoot the ropes that hold the birdcage

title: Emoji Puzzle
description: Emoji Puzzle is a cool simple game that can make you strain your brain! Look for paired emojis by meaning and connect them. Click one by one on emojis from different columns to connect them with a line! Use your imagination and complete all the interesting levels!
instructions: The goal of the game is to connect all emojis on a common theme and complete all levels Control on the PC: click the LMB on the game elements. Control on a mobile device: touch on game elements on the touch screen.

title: Cocktail Puzzle
description: An addictive puzzle and matching game to train your brain. Pouring the cocktails properly to filter and sort them into separate glasses (same color liquids in the same glass). Play now!
instructions: Tap the glass to select it, then tap another glass to pour the liquid into. Note: The liquid can only be poured into the glass if it is the same color as the liquid on top (and there is enough space for it).

title: Animals Memory Match
description: Click a card to reveal the Image on it. Memorize it so that you can match to similar Image. Match all of the cards on the board to complete the level. Complete all 24 levels to win this game.
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Red and Blue Stickman 2
description: The Forest Temple is an addictive platform puzzle game where you have to control two characters in sync. Control both creatures at the same time and activate the buttons that move the pedestal, push the box and collect the diamonds to get to the exit door of the jungle temple? The best maze game, teamwork game and adventure game ever in Red and Blue stick: Forest Temple Maze! It's addictive and very fun to play with your kids or your friends. Have a good time with Lava boy and Ice girl!
instructions: How to play Red and Blue Stickman 2 : Forest Temple Maze - Move Lavaboy and Ice Water girl with arrows and avoid obstacles. The red boy has to avoid the water while the blue girl has to avoid the fire. - Just tap the "Swap" button to change from Blue Girl to Fire Red Boy - Collect gems as much as you can

title: X2 Block Match
description: Are you a fan of puzzles? Then try to play X2 Block Match! The gameplay is simple yet addictive, and it involves merging colorful blocks with numbers to create higher numbers. Reach the number 2048 by joining blocks of the same value! As the game progresses, the blocks become more and more difficult to merge, and you have to use logic and strategy to reach the goal. Try your best with X2 Block Match and have fun!
instructions: Tap on the column and merge the same color blocks to get a bigger number. Analyze all moves to each the highest score!

title: POLYPUZZLE
description: Dive into a colorful world of strategic block placement! Rotate and arrange uniquely-shaped pieces to complete lines on a 10x10 grid. Plan your moves, build combos, and master this addictive game that will keep you entertained for hours!
instructions: Click and drag a piece onto the 10x10 grid. Strategically place the piece to form complete lines, either horizontally or vertically. Score points by clearing lines and building combos with consecutive line clears. The game ends when no more moves are possible. Aim for the highest score and enjoy endless hours of fun!

title: Fishing Blocks
description: Fishing Blocks is an addictive block removal puzzle game where you will have a remover block. You can move the remover block by tapping or clicking on the screen. If the remover block matches its identical fish block, the whole row will be deleted. Don't let the blocks touch the upper bounds otherwise the game will be over. Keep deleting rows as they are moving upward fastly. You can use Slow Down power-up which slows the speed of blocks.
instructions: Use a mouse or touchpad to play this game.

title: Fashion Stylist
description: Fashion Stylist: Dress up & Design is a relaxing fun puzzle game in which you can match tiles and give makeovers to your clients! Choose highly fashionable clothes, hairstyles, and eye-catching makeup to give people the makeover they desire! Deal with various clients in desperate need of a new wardrobe. Some want to upgrade themselves for a new career, others just want to become more elegant or try something new. Whatever it is, help them turn their lives around!
instructions: CHOOSE from a variety of fashionable clothes and outfits to create a new look! MAKEOVER clients to help them reach their goals and follow their dreams! STYLE clients with trendy makeup and fashionable hairstyles! SOLVE casual and addictive mahjong-like puzzles for an extra challenge!! RELAX eliminating all the tiles from the board

title: Fish Story 2
description: Welcome to Fish Story 2 - the second sequel to the beloved underwater Match 3 Game coming with fresh new graphics, a catchy tune, and lots of improvements! Meet your new host, the mermaid herself who will be pleased to guide you on your adventure through incredible 2,000+ splashy levels and teach you all the tricks you need to know to solve even the most complicated puzzles.
instructions: Match at least 3 of the same undersea items to get all the stars. Match more than 4 of the same colour and you will collect additional power-ups and boosters! So what are you waiting for? Play and enjoy the incredible Fish Story 2 now for free!

title: Children's Day Memory
description: Click the cards to flip a children's day items. Memorize their position and match them up in pairs. Match all of the cards on the board to complete the level. Each level with a difference symbol and it's harder than the last and you have limited time to complete them. It's time to check your memory skill now. What's the max level can you play?
instructions: Use mouse to play this game.

title: Memory Match - Puzzle
description: Welcome to Memory Match, the ultimate brain-boosting game! Test your memory skills and challenge yourself with various levels of difficulty. Uncover colorful cards and match them in pairs to win. With stunning visuals, captivating sound effects, and addictive gameplay, Memory Match guarantees hours of fun for players of all ages. Sharpen your mind, improve your concentration, and become a master of memory! Play now and start exercising your brain with Memory Match
instructions: Click & Match two similar cards

title: Num Bubbles Merging
description: Merge num bubbles to get the target number. To merge a bubble into another, just tap on the bubble and set your arrow towards the target bubble and release that. To win a level you need to create 10 target bubbles.
instructions: Use a mouse or touch-pad to play this game.

title: Jungle Chains
description: Find matching pairs of similar animals to add to your match count and score. So try to chain together a long matching set. You need to set all the animals free from the net to win a level.
instructions: Use a mouse or touch-pad to play this game.

title: Relaxing Puzzle Match
description: Relaxing Puzzle Match is a match-3 puzzle game with colorful graphics and a relaxing vibe. Clear the field by arranging tiles in groups horizontally or vertically. Tiles include moving and block types. Create groups of moving tiles with the same color and destroy them to earn score. Collect block tiles by destroying a group of moving tiles near them. If you stuck, use boosters: cancel the last move and change the color of the new tile. The game has many levels with various difficulty.
instructions: You must clear a tile-filled field by placing limited new tiles next to the current ones. Tiles are of two types: moving, marked with an arrow indicating color and direction, and blocks, marked with a target. Form groups of three or more tiles of the same color horizontally or vertically to destroy them. Destroy groups of moving tiles next to blocks to collect them. If you stuck, use boosters to cancel a last move or change a new tile's color.

title: Take Apart
description: Take Apart is a very simple sorting game, only this time you have to sort the barbell pieces. All you need to do is to use the empty rack and put the barbell pieces of the same color in the same place on the rack. This is also the time to test your observation and brain. Are you ready?
instructions: Tap to play

title: Text Talk
description: Everyone’s favorite crossword game — sharpen your brain while you criss-cross text! The show is TEXT TALK and YOU are the guest star! Given a handful of letters, try to find as many words as you can and complete the crossword puzzle. This text twist of a word game is great for challenging your mind. Hundreds of word puzzles combine word search, jumble games, anagrams, and crosswords! If you enjoy word connect and word find games you’ll LOVE Text Talk. ► Over 200 levels! ► Show off your book-smarts by finding bonus words in addition to the puzzle words. ► Puzzles start off easy but become challenging fast! ► No Time Limits, No Pressure. ► Earn free coins and use them for hints if you get stuck.
instructions: No need for this game

title: Classic Sudoku Puzzle
description: A sudoku classic game that meets a sudoku grid. Whether you want to train your brain or pass your free time. It’s a calm but challenging puzzle that you’ll be addicted to in no time!
instructions: The rules for sudoku are simple. A 9×9 square must be filled in with numbers from 1-9 with no repeated numbers in each line, horizontally or vertically. To challenge you more, there are 3×3 squares marked out in the grid, and each of these squares can’t have any repeat numbers either.

title: Chain Disk 2048
description: Chain Disk 2048 is a refreshing 2048 game. Each disk has numbers on it, and you need to control the disks with the same number to collide with each other to make it into new numbers. Let's blow as many discs and complete the targets of every level now!
instructions: Tap to play

title: Find The Difference Emoji Puzzle
description: Find The Difference: Emoji Puzzle is a very interesting game, similar to the traditional find the difference game. But it will give you a lot of identical expressions to confuse you. You have to look carefully and find all the different expressions in a limited time to move to the next level!
instructions: Click to play

title: Fruit Matcher
description: Swap fruits to make a group of 3 or more identical fruits adjacent horizontally or vertically. Keep matching till you unlock and clear all the tiles. Use power-ups to speed up the process.
instructions: Use a mouse or touch-pad to play this game.

title: Bead Cleaner Amaze
description: Bead Cleaner Amaze is a very simple casual game. You just need to manipulate the tool so that it can help the bead to go to clean. Each level has different colors of beads to eliminate, eliminate them all you will also pass. There are many levels for you to challenge, come and try!
instructions: Slide to move

title: Candy Plus Candy
description: Candy Plus Candy is a match 3 game where you move candies towards other similar candies to make a line of 3 similar candies. Early you match all the candies more score you will get.
instructions: Use a mouse or touch-pad to play this game.

title: Sprinkle Plants Puzzle Game
description: Sprinkle Plants Puzzle Game is an interesting puzzle game which has the simple game play. Rotate the board to the perfect place to water the plant to grow successfully. It also trains your brain flexibility. Would you like to try it?
instructions: Tap to play

title: Mine Farmer 3D
description: Prepare the whole field for planting in a cute cube world with cute graphics, beat the levels and push your mind to the limits with unique brand new puzzles!
instructions: Scrolling with WASD and mouse -> Move ESC key -> Pause game Beat the levels by getting the whole field ready for planting!

title: KiSS ME
description: Help the loving couple find each other by completing various puzzles. Do not touch evil enemies and do not get too close to them. Nice graphics with many levels will not let you get bored.
instructions: Move blocks with a swipe to an empty space

title: Matches Puzzle Game
description: Matchstick Puzzle Game is a puzzle game that will give your brain a good workout. Use matchsticks to create various puzzles. Hundreds of levels are waiting for you to solve! According to the questions given in each level to start breaking through, go!
instructions: Click to play

title: Marbles Sorting
description: Marbles sorting is a great brain puzzle game, helps you to sharpen your mind. Try to sort the different marbles in the tubes until all similar marbles stay in the same tube. It helps in coping with stress and refreshes your mind.
instructions: Use a mouse or touch-pad to play this game.

title: Hexa Block Puzzle
description: Hexa Block Puzzle is a free puzzle game that doesn't need too much time effort, it's fun and addictive with beautifully crafted graphics, animation, and interesting gameplay! Easy to play, but difficult to be a master. More blocks crush, more score you will get. Try it and you will love this block puzzle game.
instructions: - Drag the piece and fill the giant hexagon with clusters of colored bricks! - The rule is that you can only drop the piece in the blanks.
